sys_script_fix.description: Fix script for UW for setting the closing date for the past work orders that didn't recieve it.
sys_script_fix.name: Work Order Closing Date Fix

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_fix_b55caf181bce1910ae5b21b5ec4bcb0b
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>Fix script for UW for setting the closing date for the past work orders that didn't recieve it. </description> <name>Work Order Closing Date Fix</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[var woGR = new GlideRecord('x_nuvo_eam_clinical_work_orders'); woGR.addEncodedQuery('closed_atISEMPTY^state=3^ORstate=7'); woGR.setLimit(1); woGR.query();
while (woGR.next()){ woGR.setValue('closed_At',woGR.sys_updated_on); // this date can be changed to a few options depending on customer want
}]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>Michael.Piazza@nuvolo.com</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-09-16 14:58:13</sys_created_on> <sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update> <sys_id>b55caf181bce1910ae5b21b5ec4bcb0b</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Work Order Closing Date Fix</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Diagnostic Tool" source="x_nuvo_diag">3acdaefd1be7fc107798a9b7624bcb74</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade> <sys_scope display_value="Diagnostic Tool">3acdaefd1be7fc107798a9b7624bcb74</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_b55caf181bce1910ae5b21b5ec4bcb0b</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>Michael.Piazza@nuvolo.com</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-09-16 14:58:13</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
